me.heading: I'm Emrah Emirov
me.description: I am a software engineer. I am studying at Manisa Celal Bayar University. I generally develop Node.js based applications. I use React.js for frontend development and Node.js (express) for backend development. I am actively developing applications with translation in different languages and role-based authentication available. I like to take part in projects that will constantly improve myself and to research the necessary code flows while developing a project.
